apps.localizedDescription:
EeveeSpotify is a Spotify IOS app tweak that removes ads, removes limited skips, and almost every other premium feature. It even allows you to fetch lyrics from third-party APIs bypassing Spotify's monthly limit! The only main premium feature that does not work is offline downloads, as this is done server-side.

 Sposify is a Spotify IOS app tweak that adds various enhancements to the Spotify IOS application.

 More Info:
 https://github.com/SpotCompiled/SpotC-Plus-Plus

 We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with any other company, agency or government agency. privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify view and add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: This lets Spotify add events to your calendar.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This lets Spotify access calendars you may have shared with your contacts.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.

permissions.usageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.

This lets you scan Spotify Codes.

This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.

apps.name: YouTube ðŸ—¿
apps.subtitle: YT with more features!
apps.localizedDescription: Fordy's YouTube+ is an enhanced Youtube app that offers a superior Youtube experience

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Fordy's YouTube+ requires access to your Apple Music library.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Fordy's YouTube+ requires Bluetooth access to connect with nearby peripherals.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Fordy's YouTube+ requires access to the camera to capture photos and videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Fordy's YouTube+ requires access to your contacts to help you share content with your friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Fordy's YouTube+ requires local network access to connect and communicate with nearby devices.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Fordy's YouTube+ requires access to your location while using the app to provide personalized recommendations.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Fordy's YouTube+ requires access to your microphone to record audio.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Fordy's YouTube+ requires access to your Photo Library to save photos and videos.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, Fordy's YouTube+ will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.
